description: The Kari Traa Juliane Wool Half-Zip is a premium 100% Merino wool baselayer with a slim fit. Featuring a Jacquard knit and a retro-inspired design, this quick-drying, warm top allows unrestricted movement and has next-to-skin softness. Breathable and naturally odor resistant, the Juliane is an elegant and enduring must-have for your winter wardrobe.
name: Juliane Wool Half Zip - Womens
